alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 28 at 2:52AM PST until November 29 at 12:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO MIDNIGHT PST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. Strongest winds along the desert slopes of the mountains into adjacent desert areas. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From noon today to midnight PST tonight. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains
